name: TMR_ST_SPINAL_CRD
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field Tumor Site Spinal Cord.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TMR_ST_SPINAL_CRD_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Site Spinal Cord.
entries: Specify Bony Level (e.g., C5, T2, L3), if known
